response.overview: One day at work, unsuccessful puppeteer Craig finds a portal into the head of actor John Malkovich. The portal soon becomes a passion for anybody who enters its mad and controlling world of overtaking another human body.
response.tagline: Ever wanted to be someone else? Now you can.
response.title: Being John Malkovich

titles.title: Dans la peau de John Malkovitch

release_dates.note: En surrealistisk komedie der mennesker får mulighet til å gå inn i en ukjent kropp å leve som ham. Filmen får 11-årsgrense pga. moderate sex skildringer og forfølgelsesscener med skyting.

results.name: John Malkovich Goes Into His Own Head
